thread.title: Incredible Hotel, 1/2 hr from Entebbe Airport
thread.title_full: Incredible Hotel, 1/2 hr from Entebbe Airport - Review of Lake Victoria Serena Golf Resort & Spa, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: GLouiseN
title: Incredible Hotel, 1/2 hr from Entebbe Airport
text:
Great hotel to stay in, when arriving for the first time in Uganda. Luxury hotel. Brand new. Beautiful swimming pool. Lovely staff.Lovely restaurant. Well looked after.Buffet breakfast with incredible selection of local and western foods for all tastes.We stayed 2 nights here, and really happy with this hotel.Very modern, nice way to start your trip.
Room Tip: We stayed in one of the villas near the pool.Lots of steps so if mobility issues, ensure you have a... See more room tips
